mapper.insert: insert into milkyCart (cartCode, id, productCode, cartOption, cartQty) values ('cart001'||milkyCartSeq.nextval , 'yun', #{productCode}, #{cartOption}, #{cartQty})
mapper.select: select productName, productUnit, id, cartOption, cartQty from milkyCart join milkyproductinfo using(productcode) where id=#{id}
